thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Why the SOX Won’t Get Socked

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Why the SOX Won’t Get Socked
text:
Chip stocks might look expensive, but looks can be deceiving. Investors should keep that in mind for the turbulent times that may still lie ahead.
Semiconductor names led the technology sector on a strong comeback Tuesday after having been brutalized during the previous two sessions. That was led by strong gains at Micron, Skyworks and Qualcomm. Micron closed the day up more than 10% after having boosted its outlook for the quarter ending March 1, thus providing the latest sign that historically high memory prices aren’t turning...
